q: How should I store flood panels between seasons?
a: Keep indoors, vertical on padded racks, gasket side up. Avoid direct sunlight and stacked storage. Humidity < 70 % prevents mold and oxidation.
Short-term only, under waterproof cover with airflow gap. Never rest directly on soil or concrete.

q: Should I remove gaskets during long storage?
a: No—leave installed but relieve clamp tension to avoid compression set. Apply talc dusting to maintain elasticity.

q: What's the best way to label panels for quick deployment?
a: Use color-coded tags matching opening ID drawings from your site survey. Keeps deployment under 10 minutes.
Yes—aluminum racks with casters sized for Modular Flood Barrier panels up to 6 ft.
